title: IG is RUINED
text: This new update makes it damn near impossible to use Instagram the way we used to. The algorithm doesn‚Äôt show you what your friends are posting and vice versa and the new layout is just messy and makes it harder to access your direct messages. IG is trying to hard to be like TikTok which is inevitably going to lead to less and less users. You don‚Äôt have to do everything the same because it‚Äôs working for someone else. Listen to your users. There are a ton of social media posts on X and TikTok that are mega viral and are discussing the same thing I am.

title: Repeated DM messages not displaying correctly
text: Hello, Recently, I have been experiencing an ongoing issue with Instagram Direct Messages. Some messages from the other person, as well as parts of my own messages, do not appear in the chat‚Äîeven though the other person has not deleted them, and I do not use Vanish Mode at all. The messages only disappear visually. When I delete the app and reinstall it, the missing messages reappear. However, this issue keeps happening repeatedly, which is extremely frustrating. Every time I need to view a specific message, I am forced to delete and reinstall the application just to see it again. I am not sure what is causing this glitch, but it seems to be a syncing or loading issue within the app. I sincerely hope that an ASAP update will fix this problem, as it significantly affects the messaging experience. Thank you for your time and support. Best regards,
